page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT BILLINGSHURST
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN BILLINGSHURST COMES MOSTLY INTO THREE CATEGORIES,FARMING, OFFICE WORK,AND SHOP WORK. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS THERE IS NO INDUSTRY IN THIS PARTICULAR AREA,AND CONSEQUENTLY LABOUR RELATIONS ARE GOOD.THE PRESENT RATE OF UNEMPLOYMENT IN THE HORSHAM AREA OF WHICH THIS IS PART,IS THE LOWEST IN THE COUNTRY AT 5.6%. EMPLOYMENT IN THE RURAL PORTION OF THIS SECTION IS MOSTLY THE FOLLOWING :A NUMBER OF ARABLE AND DAIRY FARMS,AN EGG FARM,A DAIRY,A PIGGERY,LITTLE CHEF RESTAURANT,A PUBLIC HOUSE,FROZEN MEAT SUPPLIERS,INGFIELD MANOR SCHOOL FOR THE HANDICAPPED,AND A GARAGE.
